answerBox.snippet: Shepard Fairey's work has been offered at auction multiple times, with realized prices ranging from 1 USD to 950,000 USD, depending on the size and medium of the artwork. Since 2008 the record price for this artist at auction is 950,000 USD for HOPE, sold at Santa Monica Auctions in 2023.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How much is an original Shepard Fairey?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
How much are original Shepard Fairey paintings worth? Shepard Fairey is an extremely popular urban artist whose work has been extremely influential for the last twenty years, as such his paintings are worth anywhere from a thousand to over a hundred thousand dollars.
May 19, 2022
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Shepard Fairey Paintings for Sale | Value Guide | Heritage Auctions

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do I find out what my art is worth?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Consider finding an appraiser to determine the value of your artwork. Appraisers are trained specialists who work for a fee. They evaluate your piece and give you a written statement of its value.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: How Much Is Your Object Worth? | Smithsonian American Art Museum

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is Shepard Fairey's most famous piece?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: The artist is perhaps best known for his Hope (2008) campaign, which portrays a portrait of then-presidential candidate Barack Obama, in red, white, and blue.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Shepard Fairey | Artnet

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Why is Shepard Fairey's art important?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: World-renowned for his use of art to address social and environmental justice, Fairey's latest work champions the importance of conversations around climate, and the crucial role that art plays in reconnecting us with pressing global issues.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: “Rise Above Earth Justice” Mural in Shoreditch, London - Obey Giant
